title: No Title
body:
Why is it the level agreement cannot be the same? Why must the forums be so difficult to make a reply... or even to like a thread? I'm level 7 in game and I get sad Amumu icon saying I need to be level 5??? I need clarification on this!

Edit: Why does it say on the forums I'm level 4?
Edit 2: Concepts and Creation I need to be level 6 to create a discussion?

replies.body: I've got ahead and pushed through a manual profile sync for you, and it does look like the profile side of your boards account has already been updated. Let me know if you still can't make those posts over in C&C though!
I'm seriously not understanding the forums at all...

It takes a little time for the forum to update. I've seen myself using my old summoner name for days before it refreshed itself.

Just give it a little time and it will update itself eventually.

> [{quoted}](name=Flash FlÃ¡y,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dg3RMIpm,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-08-13T23:30:19.866+0000)
>
> It takes a little time for the forum to update. I've seen myself using my old summoner name for days before it refreshed itself.
> 
> Just give it a little time and it will update itself eventually.

Alrighty, I'll try to wait and be good :3
